description: The Belarus police crackdown continues with officers deploying water cannon and making mass arrests.
title: Belarus: Hundreds more arrested in anti-Lukashenko protests
title_page: Belarus: Hundreds more arrested in anti-Lukashenko protests - BBC News
maintext: Many opposition activists have been beaten up by police and thousands have been arrested during months of unrest. They are demanding the release of all political prisoners and a free and fair re-run of the election.
